about_the_game:
In Avian Colony, your leadership and strategic skills will be tested as you strive to build a thriving floating colony in a hostile world. By carefully managing resources, aiding refugees, constructing robust defenses, and navigating the many challenges that come your way to ensure survival of the colony.

Game Features

  • Efficient Use of Space: Make efficient use of the available floating space by planning your layout carefully to maximize productivity and defense.
  • Resource Management: Gather and manage essential resources such as food and building materials to sustain your colony.
  • Health: Keep an eye on the health of your colonists. Ensure they are well-fed, healthy.
  • Combat Strategy: Develop and implement strategic defense plans to repel attacks from hostile forces.
  • Prepare for the Worst: Always be prepared for unexpected challenges by maintaining reserves of essential resources.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K (4 * 3400) / AMD FX-8350 (4 * 4000)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 (2048 MB) / AMD Radeon RX 470 (2048 MB)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space MB available space

short_description: Avian Colony is a survival simulation game that places you in the role of the ruler of a floating colony in a harsh sky world. Your main goal is to ensure the survival and prosperity of your colony by managing resources, planning strategically, and defending against threats.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Thai, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, German
